statements: SELECT * FROM TaxInformation WHERE taxpayer_id = 1;
SELECT taxpayer_name, tax_amount FROM TaxInformation WHERE taxable_year = 2020;
SELECT taxpayer_id, taxpayer_name, tax_amount, taxable_year FROM TaxInformation WHERE tax_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM TaxInformation WHERE tax_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT taxpayer_id, taxable_year, tax_amount FROM TaxInformation WHERE taxpayer_id = 2 OR taxpayer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM TaxInformation WHERE tax_amount > 1000 ORDER BY taxable_year DESC, taxpayer_name ASC
SELECT taxpayer_name, tax_amount FROM TaxInformation WHERE taxable_year = 2021 ORDER BY tax_amount DESC
SELECT taxpayer_id, taxpayer_name, taxable_year, tax_amount FROM TaxInformation WHERE tax_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY taxpayer_id ASC
SELECT taxpayer_id, taxpayer_name FROM TaxInformation WHERE taxable_year IN (2019, 2020) ORDER BY taxpayer_name ASC
SELECT taxpayer_id, taxpayer_name, tax_amount FROM TaxInformation WHERE taxpayer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY tax_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM tax_info;
SELECT taxpayer_name, income FROM tax_info;
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name, income, tax_rate FROM tax_info WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM tax_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_tax FROM tax_reports WHERE total_tax < 10000;
SELECT * FROM tax_info;
SELECT taxpayer_name, income FROM tax_info WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM tax_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT t.taxpayer_name, r.total_tax FROM tax_info t JOIN tax_reports r ON t.tax_id = r.tax_payer_id;
SELECT t.tax_id, t.taxpayer_name, SUM(r.total_tax) AS total_tax_paid FROM tax_info t JOIN tax_reports r ON t.tax_id = r.tax_payer_id GROUP BY t.tax_id, t.taxpayer_name;
SELECT * FROM TaxPayers;
SELECT name, address FROM TaxPayers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT tax_return_id, income, expenses FROM TaxReturns WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM TaxReports WHERE tax_amount > 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT taxpayer_id, SUM(tax_due) AS total_tax_due FROM TaxReturns GROUP BY taxpayer_id;
SELECT * FROM TaxPayers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM TaxPayers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT t.name, tr.income, tr.expenses FROM TaxPayers t INNER JOIN TaxReturns tr ON t.id = tr.taxpayer_id WHERE tr.income > 50000;
SELECT tr.report_date, tr.tax_amount FROM TaxReports tr INNER JOIN TaxPayers t ON t.id = tr.taxpayer_id WHERE t.name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT t.name, tr.tax_due FROM TaxPayers t LEFT JOIN TaxReturns tr ON t.id = tr.taxpayer_id WHERE tr.tax_due > 0 ORDER BY tr.tax_due DESC;
SELECT * FROM TaxPayers WHERE tax_category = 'Individual'
SELECT taxpayer_name, tax_category FROM TaxPayers ORDER BY taxpayer_name DESC
SELECT tax_year, income, tax_amount FROM TaxDetails WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY tax_year ASC
SELECT payment_amount FROM TaxPayments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT taxpayer_name, report_details FROM TaxPayers INNER JOIN TaxReports ON TaxPayers.taxpayer_id = TaxReports.taxpayer_id
SELECT taxpayer_id, taxpayer_name, taxpayer_address FROM TaxPayers;
SELECT * FROM TaxDetails WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT payment_id, tax_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM TaxPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT taxpayer_name, tax_category, income, tax_amount FROM TaxPayers JOIN TaxDetails ON TaxPayers.taxpayer_id = TaxDetails.taxpayer_id;
SELECT report_id, taxpayer_id, report_year, SUBSTRING(report_details, 1, 50) AS short_report FROM TaxReports WHERE LENGTH(report_details) > 100;
SELECT * FROM tax_payers;
SELECT tax_payer_name, tax_payer_income FROM tax_payers ORDER BY tax_payer_income DESC;
SELECT tax_payer_name, tax_payer_income FROM tax_payers WHERE tax_payer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY tax_payer_income ASC;
SELECT tax_payer_name, tax_payer_income FROM tax_payers WHERE tax_payer_income > 50000;

SELECT tax_payer_name, sum(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM tax_payers JOIN tax_payments ON tax_payers.tax_payer_id = tax_payments.tax_payer_id GROUP BY tax_payers.tax_payer_id ORDER BY total_payments DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_payers ORDER BY tax_payer_name DESC, tax_payer_income ASC, tax_payer_address;

SELECT form_id, form_type, tax_payers.tax_payer_name, tax_payments.payment_date FROM tax_forms INNER JOIN tax_payers ON tax_forms.tax_payer_id = tax_payers.tax_payer_id INNER JOIN tax_payments ON tax_payers.tax_payer_id = tax_payments.tax_payer_id WHERE form_year = 2021 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;

SELECT tax_payer_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM tax_payers INNER JOIN tax_payments ON tax_payers.tax_payer_id = tax_payments.tax_payer_id GROUP BY tax_payer_name HAVING total_payments > 10000;

SELECT tax_payers.tax_payer_name, tax_deductions.deduction_type, tax_deductions.deduction_amount FROM tax_payers LEFT JOIN tax_deductions ON tax_payers.tax_payer_id = tax_deductions.tax_payer_id WHERE deduction_amount > 500 ORDER BY tax_payer_name;

SELECT tax_payer_name, tax_payer_income, report_year, report_comments FROM tax_payers LEFT JOIN tax_reports ON tax_payers.tax_payer_id = tax_reports.tax_payer_id WHERE report_year = 2020 AND report_comments IS NOT NULL ORDER BY tax_payer_income DESC;
